Introduction

Jeong Ichan (정이찬), also known as Jeong Echan, is a South Korean singer and music producer under HYPLE Entertainment. As a trainee, he is known for appearing and competing in the suvival show "I-LAND" under the name Jaebeom. He made his official debut on June 23, 2022 with the digital single "Eternal Summer."

Echan is also a member of the producing team "YOUTH."

On December 29th, he was revealed to be a participant in the 2022 survival show "Boys Planet" using the name Jeong I Chan.
